cards.rules_text: Surveil 2, then draw two cards. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

Whenever one or more lands you control become a creature, distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two lands you control.
{4}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 green Elemental creature until end of turn.
Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {U}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Dormant Copse: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

Whenever Kywon attacks, create an X/X blue Drake creature token with flying, where X is the number of instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard.
You may sacrifice another creature as an additional cost to cast instant and sorcery spells. If you do, that spell costs {2} less to cast.
Escape-{2}{U}{B}, Exile three instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard.

Create three 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens.
Revolt - If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
You draw three cards and you lose 3 life. Creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

Prowess
When Lichbound Arsonist dies, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
Search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 5 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 5 life.
At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, return a creature card with lesser or equal mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.

This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the power of its target. (Opponents and planeswalkers are powerless.)
Learning Fiendishly deals 6 damage to any target.

Whenever Emberwalker enters or attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn.
As long as you're ancient, you may play cards exiled with Emberwalker. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

Whenever Kywon attacks, create an X/X blue Drake creature token with flying, where X is the number of instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard.
You may sacrifice another creature as an additional cost to cast instant and sorcery spells. If you do, that spell costs {2} less to cast.
Escape-{2}{U}{B}, Exile three instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.) (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

Flash
Multitude {4}{U}{U} (You may cast this for {4}{U}{U}. When you do, copy it.)
You may have Wildkin Imposter enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create an X/X blue Drake creature token with flying, where X is that spell's mana value.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Drakes you control have total power 8 or greater, draw a card. Then you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you didn't return a card to an opponent's hand this way, draw a card.

Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, you may discard a card that shares a color with that spell.
If you would be dealt damage, discard that many cards instead.
When you have no cards in hand, you lose the game.
When Mindblight Connoisseur enters, each opponent discards a card. Each opponent who didn't discard a card with mana value 3 or greater this way loses 2 life.

When Gravepact Wisdom enters, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Whenever Vanguard Commander enters or attacks, choose one -
:: Create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens.
:: Put a +1/+1 counter on Vanguard Commander.

Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {1}
Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. If you discarded two cards that share a type this way, draw a card.

First strike, haste
Whenever a player pays an alternate cost, Unrivaled Slayer deals 3 damage to that player. (Multitude and escape costs are alternate costs. So is casting a spell for free.)

Prowess
When Gravefire Arcanist enters, when you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Escape-{1}{R}{R}, Exile six other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

Flash
Reach
Whenever a creature you don't control dies, exile it and create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.

When Razelit Meditation enters, create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice Razelit Meditation: Razelit Meditation deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

Waking Glen enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
{4}{G}{U}: Waking Glen becomes a blue and green Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.
Whenever Waking Glen deals combat damage to a player, untap each land you control.
Whenever you draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, you may put Restless Wanderer from your graveyard on top of your library.
Destroy target creature with power or toughness 2 or less.

Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Draw a card.
Revolt - At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {W} or {B}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Dormant Temple: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

Multitude {4}{G}{G} (You may cast this for {4}{G}{G}. When you do, copy it.)
Whenever a token you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildcourt Conserver.

Choose one -
:: Clutch of the Web deals 6 damage to target creature with flying.
:: Clutch of the Web deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.
Revolt - When Pureheart Cavalier enters, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 red Soldier creature token.

When Wild Huntsman enters, search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Then if you're ancient, creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

Vigilance
Whenever Cerys attacks, you may return a nontoken permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, create two 1/1 red Soldier creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

Multitude {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this for {2}{W}{W}. When you do, copy it.)
Whenever Lichbane Forerunner attacks, another target attacking Soldier you control gains indestructible until end of turn.
When Fervent Necromancer dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

When Burning Wisdom enters, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn.
Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, exile Burning Wisdom. You may play it during your next turn.
When Graverot Soothsayer enters, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

Multitude {4}{G}{W} (You may cast this for {4}{G}{W}. When you do, copy it.)
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast Elemental spells.
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, Bearer of Autumn gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

Whenever Adorned Lookout deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card and untap a land you control.
{1}{G}: Adorned Lookout gets +2/+2 and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Escape-{2}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

When Elvish Rejuvenator enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Vigilance, haste
Revolt - At the beginning of each end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
Escape-{1}{G}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

As New Divide enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice New Divide: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Target creature gets +3/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. 
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you're ancient, up to one target land you control becomes a 4/4 green Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you may instead put a card you own from exile or outside the game into your hand.

Fleshless Assailant enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard or a creature you control enters from a graveyard, return Fleshless Assailant from your graveyard to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
{1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Afterlife Augur: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It can't block this turn.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Escape-{2}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

Whenever you activate one of Hieronymus Scratch's loyalty abilities, return up to one card from your graveyard to your hand.
